group_1.narration: According to Sasao...@It was Tanito, the most senior disciple of the Kashin school,@who led the betrayal against the Tokiwa family.
I had suspected as much ever since he declared@himself the new head of the school.
But what Sasao found strange was that so many@of the senior disciples raised no objections@and instead expressed their support.

group_1.textRight: Initially, I opposed it as well.
I was far from the only one. There were quite a@few of us who stood opposed to it.
But...with each passing day, more and more people@began to side with Tanito...
And before I knew it, I was completely isolated.
On top of that, Tanito began persistently@demanding my cooperation...
At times...he said things that could only be@taken as threats...
Things like, "I'll make sure you can never be@involved in flower arrangement again."
He never said it outright.@But...there was no mistaking the implication.
Toward the end, there were even things that@made me fear for my safety...
Tanito... He wasn't like that before...
It all happened so suddenly, it was like he became@someone else entirely...
Or perhaps...he's been hiding his@true self all this time?

group_1.textLeft: Either way, thanks to you, Sasao, my next@course of action is clear.
The origin of it all lies with Tanito...
Which means I'll have to ask him directly@what his true intentions are...!

group_1.narration: At that point, I hadn't yet reached certainty,@but I had already begun to consider it a possibility.
That something even further...@lay beyond Tanito himself.

group_1.textLeft: My apologies for barging in.@I didn't come through the front door.
It's been a long time, Tanito.
May I have a word with you?
...So you're no longer even capable of@holding a proper conversation...

group_1.narration: It was then that I concluded Tanito had been marked by a@"Witch's Kiss" and was now under the Witch's control.
And so, I believed the true enemy to be@the Witch lurking behind him...
But that was only my assumption at the time.@The truth was far more complicated.
Can someone branded with a Witch's Kiss@even live a normal daily life?
I acted on flawed assumptions, born from@a lack of knowledge and experience.
As it turns out, the one hiding behind the Witch@was the real culprit behind everything.
It took the help of many allies, and a great deal of time,@to uncover that truth.
But even back then, there was one thing@I felt most certain of...

group_1.textRight: "I will accept whatever happens to me,"@did you not?

group_1.narration: The fact that Kyubey, too, is my enemy...
Yes... It was in that moment@that my revenge truly began.
At the Memory Museum, I found myself deeply@reflecting on that encounter once more.
I became the person I am today.
